entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , New Carlisle
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:59 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: New Carlisle 08:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023
Temperature: -6.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -7.5°C
Wind: E 15 km/h gust 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 15 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023
